alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:40PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON...SOUTHERN MEADE...NORTH CENTRAL HARDIN AND NORTHEASTERN BRECKINRIDGE COUNTIES... At 339 PM EDT/239 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located near Brandenburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Brandenburg, Webster, Irvington, Muldraugh, West Point, Ekron, Mauckport, Laconia, Guston and Raymond. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
